pageContext.claim: “The RINOS that run the state voting apparatus have caused us this problem of allowing the Democrats to so blatantly cheat in their attempt to steal the election, which we won overwhelmingly.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump lost the election. Joe Biden won enough states to claim 306 electoral votes to Trump’s 232. Trump said he was fighting in the courts to reverse the result, but his claims keep getting rejected by judges after they reviewed the evidence.
